
---
title: '三星 S22 立打 7 折再探新低，上市 3 月直降 1456 元'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 热榜

comments: false
date: Sat, 04 Jun 2022 15:35:23 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://img14.360buyimg.com/pop/jfs/t1/55422/1/18674/96922/6294afa5E000af997/15eacc9756b3103d.jpg'
---

<div>   
<p data-vmark="8ad4">三星今年 2 月底正式发布了 <span class="accentTextColor">Galaxy S22 系列</span>国行手机，售价 4999 元起。</p><p data-vmark="9d16">今晚 0 点京东秒杀价 3599 元，且支持使用 61.8 元全品类券（<a href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAOwJK1olXDYDZBoCUBVIMzZNXhpXVhgcDVpCVFRMVnBaRQcLDlZRAAMoUAMJaDtMWUUXFGFiEigrVzFRCxVdQRxXW31kMScJQxgeWTVzBQNKCFJLSwcYVBYZMytxSTheWE1iNCMJDwh0Cgd-TzllAkAOWG5eCUkTAm4LGlsSbQUAU1xbDE4UBF9rfDVPGX53Dho2YHsXBl9DdVolXgcAVF9cCU4eBF8IHF8QXwIFUlteDkwSM28AHGtJH1RDFm5tOEgnM18JK1glA2gDB15eCRkRBAFVHloVDVBXVDBdCkoUAmgNGF4lXwcDVlxtOA" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAOsJK1olXDYDZBoCUBVIMzZNXhpXVhgcDVpCVFRMVnBaRQcLDlZRAAMoUAMJaDtMWUUXFGFiEigrVzFRCxVdQRxXW31kMScJQxgeWTVzBQNKCFJLSwcYVBYZMxV6ehBVDnkYMTgNUwlJZyl_aV8VKWYOWG5YCUIfCmoJGl8lXgQFVlhZDUgQMwxvdQFRJXNYEDU1OEsSMyRmGmsVXgEGVltVCEsTM28PH14XWQEEUV1UC0wnA2cPKwdXD0dAZG5tC3snM244GGtLMwdRVF1eW0MfbTINGltFC1JHOl5fCUseAWYMGGsXXAcAVm5t" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=%2fpages%2funion%2fproxy%2fproxy%3fspreadUrl%3dhttps%253a%252f%252funion-click.jd.com%252fjdc%253fe%253d%2526p%%26EA_PTAG%3d17078.27.380">点此 6.18 元购买</a>），实付 3599-61.8+6.18=3543.38 元。</p><p data-vmark="2ccc">除了上述优惠，本次还可再叠京东无门槛红包，每天抽三次，即抽即用：<a href="https://u.jd.com/JwxmjrY" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://u.jd.com/JLx5OnY"
